name: Dream League Soccer 2024
summary: Dream League Soccer 2024 puts you in the heart of the action with a fresh look and brand new features! Build your dream team from over 4,000 FIFPro licensed players and take to the field against the world’s best soccer clubs! Rise through 8 divisions whilst enjoying full 3D motion-captured player moves, immersive in-game commentary, team customisations and much more. The beautiful game has never been so good!
